name: Aped
additional_notices:
The following token has a variable tax function on the smart contract to change tax rates post deployment.
Do your own research and be careful if you are trading this token.

description.en:
ABOUT THE APED COIN
$APED is more than just a classic meme token; it's a symbol of unity for all the apes within the Ethereum network. Apes are known for their strength and their ability to work together towards a common goal. This is precisely what $APED stands for, bringing together all the apes in the community to create something big, something that will stand the test of time.

In a world filled with rugs, honeypots, and tax farms, $APED stands out as a beacon of trust and reliability, a coin that truly represents the values of the ape community.

The strength of the ape community lies in its ability to work together and create something truly special. With $APED, we have the opportunity to do just that.

FEATURES
- 100% SAFE CONTRACT NO BUGS AND VULNERABILITY IN THE SMART CONTRACT.
- LIQUIDITY BURNT 100% OF THE LIQUIDITY PROVIDER TOKENS HAVE BEEN BURNT.
- REWARDS FOR INVESTORS DAILY AND MONTHLY COMPETITIONS AND AIRDROPS FOR INVESTORS.

description.bg:
ABOUT THE APED COIN
$APED is more than just a classic meme token; it's a symbol of unity for all the apes within the Ethereum network. Apes are known for their strength and their ability to work together towards a common goal. This is precisely what $APED stands for, bringing together all the apes in the community to create something big, something that will stand the test of time.

In a world filled with rugs, honeypots, and tax farms, $APED stands out as a beacon of trust and reliability, a coin that truly represents the values of the ape community.

The strength of the ape community lies in its ability to work together and create something truly special. With $APED, we have the opportunity to do just that.

FEATURES
- 100% SAFE CONTRACT NO BUGS AND VULNERABILITY IN THE SMART CONTRACT.
- LIQUIDITY BURNT 100% OF THE LIQUIDITY PROVIDER TOKENS HAVE BEEN BURNT.
- REWARDS FOR INVESTORS DAILY AND MONTHLY COMPETITIONS AND AIRDROPS FOR INVESTORS.
